verses.name: Ephesians 2:5
verses.text: Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)

verses.name: Ephesians 2:6
verses.text: And hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus:

verses.name: Ephesians 2:7
verses.text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.

verses.name: Ephesians 2:8
verses.text: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:

verses.name: Ephesians 2:9
verses.text: Not of works, lest any man should boast.
